description:
Searching for a job can be frustrating. How do you know what job you're best suited for? How do you build an outstanding resume and cover letter? Where can you find job leads? How do you go beyond your comfort zone to network? What happens when you secure an interview? And most importantly, where do you find help when you need it?

This e-course will give you the answers to all these questions, plus a plan to get you to a new job within few weeks. After completing this program, you'll be more than ready to start your search for your perfect job. Identifying the purpose for working and the assessment of skills can help determine the types of jobs you should apply for.

Make sure to check out our other courses should you be interested in taking your soft skills set to the next level.

Our other titles include:

- Developing Creativity

- Body Language Basics

- Entrepreneurship Tutorials

- Business Acumen

- Internet Marketing Fundamentals

And more...
title: Job Search Skills: Finding Your Ideal Job Quicker
